website_summaries.verdict: Whether you child loves to build things or has an interest in STEM projects, this set stands out for all the pieces and possibilities it represents.
pros: Put your child's creativity and imagination in full gear with this set's 860+ pieces that can be used to construct at least 100 different models, from cars to buildings to planes and more
Includes instructional guide and storage case
cons: The pieces come in one large bag which can be confusing and time-consuming to sort out, but most kids eager to get started probably won't mind the challenge

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware: QC Issue with Parts and Count List
customer_reviews.text: The first downhill experience was taking a few pieces apart after building something small. Several of the yellow connectors broke as we were disconnecting pieces. I contacted K’nex about this issue, and they never responded. The second issue was encountered today. My son and I spent about two hours building the carousel only to figure out that we were a few dozen pieces short, so it couldn’t be completed. He was so disappointed. It was very upsetting for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with a 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 year old grandson had a great time with this; In a few hours he built the Fishing rod, and then the Skate board with rider. He did find it difficult to snap some of the parts together, but later seemed to get the hang of it. To keep the parts organized, I gave him a couple of plastic divider boxes I had kicking around (one for the smaller parts and another for the larger beams and wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Kodiak Biker

customer_reviews.title: A surprise hit!!
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves legos. We love Legos! We bought these K'nex because they were on an awesome Amazon deal and we figured we would give them try. I was a little worried that our kids wouldn't be as interested because they don't involved characters, Avengers, and the other cool lego sets. Turns out, our family ends up playing KNEX rather often, and the best part is we typically end up doing it as a family. The kids build and the parents get to be the 'piece finders'. We love our KNEX.
customer_reviews.author: neals55

customer_reviews.title: Fun and good for the brain
customer_reviews.text: Fun and good for the brain. Our 9-year-old builds all sorts of fun contraptions and vehicles with this set. It keeps him busy for an hour or more at a time. After a few weeks, he feels like he has built everything so if there was one thing to improve on this product it would be to have online access to more designs, maybe allow kids to submit their own designs that other kids can build too. Overall, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: MG541

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend K'nex to stimulate kids creativity and thought
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this set a year ago, and LOVES it. Not only is there a booklet with ideas and instructions, but she spends hours coming up with her own design ideas as well. I highly recommend K'nex to stimulate kids creativity and thought. It's also perfect for older kids to enjoy in small group playtime (2 to 3 kids building together as they chat).
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: K'NEX has always made a great product, this is just another example of that
customer_reviews.text: K'NEX has always made a great product, this is just another example of that. The kids complained that the schematics weren't all included but that forced the kids to try and figure it out on their own and add their own creative touches. The kids feel so accomplished after making something. We have all ages and I've seen everything from Bows and Arrows to helicopters to a Titanfall large machine. Love these and would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Thatsthegoodstuff

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product for my daughter and am extremely disappointed in it. I guess I was foolish in thinking that this was a good sized box. Compared to the 20 year old plus k'nex box I already gave her this is a very sad joke..... I would not recommend this to anyone, if you want a good set you have to get the ones sold years ago. BTW the old boxes probably came with 3k - 5k pieces and a hard case to carry them in.
customer_reviews.author: R R

customer_reviews.title: Hours of entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this set for our 7 year old daughter. Our whole family LOVES it! We even printed off more instructions to make more things! My kids will spend a good 2 hours building with these so we bought another set to get extra pieces so we could make more than one thing at a time. A serious blast from our past as kids!
customer_reviews.author: Shana M. Elick

customer_reviews.title: Nurtures creativity and improves dexterity
customer_reviews.text: I know this is meant for older kids to play with but my 3.5 year really enjoys this set. My husband and I do, too. Instructional manual is nice to have but not easy to follow. I wish these came with a bit more pieces so that you can build low than 1 or 2 things at a time. Just sad to dissemble one you just created to create another one.
customer_reviews.author: WeLikeAmazonPrime

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful the little boys I gave them to has built so many things. They are well made and no broken parts so far. They where delivered very quickly. Over all they r quality made and ready for hours of fun building. The amount of things you can build is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: sweet

customer_reviews.title: A gift
customer_reviews.text: My brother is in 1st grade & likes building. He really liked this knex and there were examples And instructions of pieces to make. It’s a bit advanced for him but He made a few structures with help & there are still extra pieces to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin

customer_reviews.title: Loved and bought again for a gift
customer_reviews.text: One of the best presents my son (age 6) received, so much so we bought another as a gift. There are additional instructions available for other models available online. It took him a little while to grasp how hard the pieces click in, but now he's a pro.
customer_reviews.author: practicalmom

customer_reviews.title: Great STEM Toy for Creative Young Minds
customer_reviews.text: We got this K'NEX set for our 5 year old grandson. It keeps him occupied for hours, and he has managed to build all of the structures pictured in the instruction without adult assistance. I know it says for age 7+, however, it has proved just the trick for a bright, industrious boy who also happens to be autistic.
customer_reviews.author: Tom4628

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My kid is a LEGO fanatic and this was all new to him. The building style is different and, after a few builds, he stopped using the booklet that accompanied the set and started thinking of stiff on his own. We also had a motor from an older K-NEX roller coaster that fit this perfectly. Good toy.
customer_reviews.author: Beowulf

customer_reviews.title: Ok. But be prepared to help the kids on some
customer_reviews.text: It has alot of pieces. Granddaughter says some things are hard to put together and the instructions on some are more difficult to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our 9 y/o lives K’Nex!
customer_reviews.text: Our nine-year-old son played with K’NEX at his after school and kept talking about it. So incredibly, Santa figured that out! He loves his huge box of K’NEX parts and I’ll hear him playing in the living room in the morning by himself. It’s fantastic and really inspires the engineer and him.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great family present!
customer_reviews.text: Every year my family gets a "family present" for Christmas. We normally purchase a K'Nex kit (like the roller coaster, ferris wheel, etc.). This year we discovered we already have all their big sets so this was our purchase. We had so much fun building the helicopter and a few other small things. This set is versatile and fun. The instruction book included gives a lot of great projects. Easy for kids and adults to use and learn about building and logic.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Builders!
customer_reviews.text: This was ought for my 6yo daughter who loves to build with Legos. This set is very versatile and has many pieces for multiple kids to use at one time. The direction book is a bit lacking in directions at times, but she can usually figure it out or do it her own way to make it work. I would definitely recommend these sets for anyone who has kids who enjoy building and/or following instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Lilred75

customer_reviews.title: Unbelieveable deal!
customer_reviews.text: The value for our money was insane. We got this HUGE box with a manual and you can build up to 100 different models with this one K'nex box. My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: thejoysofraisingboys

customer_reviews.title: Great sized set, lots of pieces and combinations to build.
customer_reviews.text: Great set for my 7 year old. Only downside is most of the things you can build need directions from the Internet. Still a cool Lego alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Trent C.

customer_reviews.title: Should last for years!
customer_reviews.text: KNex are cool toys! Easy to assemble or take apart. Color coded. Instructions are easy to follow. Legos are good for solid objects but does not support structural designs. KNex is closer to engineering design but without the nuts and bolts of other products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: My six year old son has played with this every day for hours. He has been able to follow the included instructions without having to read them and has also made many of his own creations.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: A refreshing building concept.
customer_reviews.text: It is one of those great STEAM toys you know you need to entice your kid away from videogames. Let alone the fun you are gonna have with your kids, combine this with an electronic controller, and you can do pretty nifty concept gadgets just to show off your hidden Tony Stark(or at least to build something for stress relief). If you want a building concept away from the conventional up/down/left/right plastic block, look no more. Cheap, sturdy and easy to assemble, with plenty of examples in its manual and many more if you browse for inspiration.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Gram scores a HOME RUN!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday present for my 11 year-old grandson. He absolutely LOVES this toy!!! It has been a month, and he has played with this almost every day! His goal is to build every model in the booklet that came with the set. This toy rates right up there with his video games, and that's saying a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Judy A. Newberry

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this set
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this set. It is a bit tough to get the pieces apart but I suppose that will change the more it is played with. Very versatile kit. The booklet only has a few building diagrams. You must go online to look up other builds pictured.
customer_reviews.author: W. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: other than that I think children (and their mother) will have many hours of good fun.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 year old grandson and he loves it. I was surprised when I made a visit only to find his mother playing with it as well. I would only suggest to get a divider box to keep the parts separate, other than that I think children (and their mother) will have many hours of good fun.
customer_reviews.author: vitocera

customer_reviews.title: Great creative toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons love these building kits & it enjoy being creative. Keeps my boys entertained for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for young child
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old grandson was thrilled with this building set. It allows him to use both his imagination and hands in a very creative and positive way. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph LaBelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Kid Builder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 7-year-old nephew. These are not super quick/easy to build, and not every kid is going to be into this. For kids that enjoy sitting down for an extended period of time and reading instructions on how to build something, it's a great gift. Do note that while this set has enough pieces to allow for building a lot of different things, there are not detailed directions for all of them. We just looked at the tiny included pictures to figure out how to build many items. He's really enjoyed this, and has since gotten another K'Nex set.
customer_reviews.author: C. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 7 year old grandson. He is constantly building something with these! Really uses his imagination and builds some wild stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Fred A Cnota

customer_reviews.title: Another nice kit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought several kits for my grandson for Xmas and he loves them. I was money well sent. I bought extra batteries which is a must have for building projects. My grandson has made many items so far and doesn't want to take them apart. Just wants to make more.
customer_reviews.author: K. Juday

customer_reviews.title: excellent deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size kit, exactly what I needed. My nephew loved it and there are so many model to build that it has been over a month and he still not done building this different models. I like the fact that you can easily expand this by adding other kits with motors, etc.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandson and I had hours of fun . Instructions are easy to follow and we had no trouble assembling our projects. A great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret E. Holdman

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for myself for nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: But my friends son plays with it way more than I do. Fun to watch him play with it, i still mess around with it while watching TV sometimes. Knex>Lego of course.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M

customer_reviews.title: Lots of variety - great set!
customer_reviews.text: Great set! My son has recently fallen in love with KNEX and we have been buying a few different kits to let him build with. This set has great variety of models and pieces. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: joshf128

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good, my son and I love to assemble together, i bought a box with a lot of cell's and arranged all the parts in it so it will be easy to assemble. Great product
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit! GREAT Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great for any kid who loves to build. My son loves legos, and now he loves these too. He can build so many things with it!
customer_reviews.author: Katertha

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: So this is something my children have not been able to stop playing with. We have had it for a few weeks now and my kids love it. Windmills, cars, spaceships - you name it and they build it. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: samcrowESQ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product. I seems to be well built and the kids enjoy creating their own vehicles and buildings.
customer_reviews.author: Loric

customer_reviews.title: great and creative
customer_reviews.text: our 4,5 years old son loves loves k'nex. despite the fact that it is for older children.
customer_reviews.author: MonLifeStrolling

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES these. Love that it comes with a book with a ton of ideas. She makes one and then uses the extra making stuff she feels like making by using the Ol' imagination. Love it. She loves it. That's all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Grisanti

customer_reviews.title: My grandson will LOVE this! He wanted this really bad so I ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson will LOVE this! He wanted this really bad so I picture him smiling when he gets it in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Ricks

customer_reviews.title: My 9 & 4 year old loves this product. ...
customer_reviews.text: My 9 & 4 year old loves this product. Keeps them busy for hours building and creating. Simple enough for the 4 year old to make basic things and with instructions my 9 year old can make more detailed and difficult things.
customer_reviews.author: Review Lady

customer_reviews.title: Our K'nex Collection Keeps Growing!
customer_reviews.text: The kids love these - we keep adding to their collection and they keep building cooler and cooler things. They go on YouTube and find ideas to build new and exciting things. Wish I had these as a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Y KravitzTop Contributor: Fantasy Books

customer_reviews.title: Missing several pieces
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product it was missing 1/3 of the pieces. I would like a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful entertainment
customer_reviews.text: This set is large enough to build so many different and entertaining items. It is a step up from Lego toys in that it has all of the connectors to be able to build on angles, etc. We got it for our 7 yr old grandson and his whole family has played with it and all I hear is great comments about it!!!! Wonderful gift-great entertainment for all ages over 4 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: JMJM

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter LOVES these!!
customer_reviews.text: My son used to build everything with these when he was young, so I was excited to get them for his 11 year old daughter for Christmas. She LOVES them, and has been held up in her room building ever since!! She wants to be an engineer, so these were right up her alley. She’s already trying to decide which set she wants for her next birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Christine C.

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun with the kiddos
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun with the kiddos. Can be a little hard to join some pieces for younger ones - Knex Jr are great if they have difficulty with these.
customer_reviews.author: Burly Squid

customer_reviews.title: Keeps their minds engaged!
customer_reviews.text: This product keeps my 10 yr. old granddaughter entertained. She loves to build things. We can work on things together making for a fun time at mom mom's house.
customer_reviews.author: cruising cutie

customer_reviews.title: Very good to build creativity
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with any of the K'nex products. I think my son literal plays with these things all day everyday he is out of school. Very good to build creativity.
customer_reviews.author: wtnha

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as a gift to my friend’s son and daughter. They like it. It is a very good stem toy.
customer_reviews.author: Qiang Xu

customer_reviews.title: Lots to do
customer_reviews.text: This set includes lots of pieces, there are alot of things to make.
customer_reviews.author: BrickOven

customer_reviews.title: Always happy with knex
customer_reviews.text: Great set for kids of all ages with plenty of imagination
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Neat kit lots of parts
customer_reviews.text: Neat kit with lots of parts. My only complaint is that it should've come with a couple more gears of different sizes. Would buy again, though.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: My 5yo son and 9yo daughter both love this set. It's great to see them concentrate, problem-solve, and even work together to build new creations. My 5yo needs some guidance to execute his ideas sometimes, but I love building with these, too!
customer_reviews.author: K. Marti

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids that want to be hands on
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Bought it for my grandson who is 7 and just wants to tear things apart and put them back together. The sizes are perfect for him. It came with a few instructions on a building a few things which he loves. I think my next purchase will be with some type of motors so he can make things that move.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Johnston

customer_reviews.title: If you have boys, you need this box.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot write a high enough recommendation for this project. My son and I made the Eiffel Tower in an afternoon. Smiles all around!
customer_reviews.author: PBacon

customer_reviews.title: Knex are awesome! For the kid who lives legos but is ...
customer_reviews.text: Knex are awesome! For the kid who lives legos but is ready for a little more...this was perfect. A huge set to build plenty of projects. Definitely a great starter set to get you going
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Incredible kit for a great price - there are so many options as to ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredible kit for a great price - there are so many options as to what we can build. Both children (ages 3 and 5) can use it. We have many different building sets, and this one really encourages unique creations.
customer_reviews.author: B. Querns

customer_reviews.title: Great general set for specific projects or just play
customer_reviews.text: Great general set with instruction booklet that provides steps for many great projects. Lots of pieces and room to be creative too!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin McGlone Vonderschmitt

customer_reviews.title: My 9 yr old son made some pretty cool stuff like a motorcycle and fishing rod
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yr old son made some pretty cool stuff like a motorcycle and fishing rod. He loves this set.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: It's just as much fun for me as my son. Easy to read and follow diagrams for putting the different models together. There is even enough pieces in this set to put a few together at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Great for Entertaining Two Kids!
customer_reviews.text: I opened this the week of Thanksgiving when we had a lot of kids in the house. My eight-year-old son and eleven-year-old nephew loved these and spent a lot of time building things. It kept them busy and quiet! My eleven-year-old daughter joined in a few times. I bought this on sale, and it was definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tntholley

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment for kids
customer_reviews.text: Grandson looooves knex no explanation needed cames on time packaged well as advertised.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for imagination!
customer_reviews.text: My son will sit and play with this for hours. It has so encouraged his imagination!
customer_reviews.author: maggiejogreen

customer_reviews.title: one of our favorite
customer_reviews.text: These are a favorite! so versatile. my boys get really excited about building with these

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 9 and 5 year olds..they play with it alot and spend alot of time with it
customer_reviews.author: Monika Tyagi

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my six-year-old. He absolutely loves them. Gives you a changeup from Legos. This one was perfect size just right.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing and classic toy that will keep your kids busy ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing and classic toy that will keep your kids busy for hours. My girls (ages 5 and 8) have built so many different things with this set. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Fialkoff

customer_reviews.title: One of the best stem toys/ games
customer_reviews.text: One of the best stem toys/ games. Unlimited things to make and create. Not only for kids but also for their parents to work and build different things.
customer_reviews.author: MHPetiwala

customer_reviews.title: The parts are first rate quality with enough variety to build pretty much any structure you can dream up
customer_reviews.text: This regrettably is my first Knex set. As a kid I always used Lego. The parts are first rate quality with enough variety to build pretty much any structure you can dream up. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson, age 7, loves this. He's still playing with it a year later.
customer_reviews.author: V Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Ideal toy to encourage creativity and play in boys
customer_reviews.text: I am always a fan of any toy that encourages imagination and this one was ideal for a 7 yr. old boy who needs a creative outlet. I got it as a deal of the day, which made it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra S.

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with K'Nex!  They are great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for our 8 year old grandson and he loved it! We used to play with K'nex when our children were young and I think the adults had just as much fun as the kids!

customer_reviews.title: My grandsons (11 & 7) enjoyed this, they are great at following the directions ...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.author: Diana C.

product_meta.title: K'NEX 100 Model Imagine Building Set (Amazon Exclusive)
product_meta.description:
Style:model 100

Learning doesn’t need to be boring! Stimulate your children’s imagination with the exciting K’NEX 100 Model Building Set. Each box contains 863 classic parts and pieces that can be connected to each other to form different structures and automobiles.

K’NEX 100 Model Building Set consists of plastic rods and connectors which can be built into cars, planes, sea creatures, and more. The illustrated instruction booklet provides 100 building ideas. It helps guide budding engineers to constructing amazing creations. Foster your kids’ imagination and watch them build a helicopter, motorcycle, dinosaur, or even a tall building! This educational toy provides endless entertainment and helps your kids to better understand STEAM (science, technology, engineer, arts and math) subjects. 

K’NEX supports the development of a child’s growth namely: hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills, problem-solving ability, spatial awareness, and exercising the imagination. Creating an elaborate building or a transforming creature is possible with the K’NEX rods and connectors. Simply combine these pieces in different ways. All parts are proudly made in the USA using responsible manufacturing techniques in Hatfield, Pennsylvania. All K’NEX products undergo the strictest quality and safety standards. They are tested and guaranteed to be highly durable.

The K’NEX 100 Model Building Set comes with a portable suitcase box that acts as handy storage to help keep all the parts organized in one place. Get the toy set today and see your kids create scale models of famous buildings, a working hot air balloon, creepy crawlies, blazing fast race cars, and just about anything they can think of and more!
feature_bullets: CLASSIC PIECES – This set comes with 863 classic K’NEX rods and connectors. These pieces can be attached to one another in different ways. It allows your children to create a multitude of shapes, figures, and structures with ease. The snap fit pieces stick together securely and can be easily reassembled into other creations

REAL MOVING PARTS – Unlike other building toys, K’NEX allows kids to create unique models that actually move. Kids can make interactive toys using K’NEX parts whether its wheels, rotors, wings, and tracks. Making rolling cars, working amusement park rides or a transforming animal isn’t just a dream when you have this 100 Model Building Set!

CONVENIENT STORAGE – With over 860 pieces, K’NEX presents the 100 Model Building Set in a hassle-free portable suitcase storage box. You don’t need to worry about where to store small plastic toy parts or getting them lost. Keep all the K’NEX parts in one place that is easy to access. Store all those precious pieces in this handy suitcase storage box that kids will always love to open. Packaging may vary.

VERSATILE – This building set includes an instructional booklet, which shows builders how to create 100 unique models with its helpful illustrations. This toy is ideal for boys and girls aged 7+ and up, as they can make anything that their minds can come up with. Foster your kids’ imagination and creativity with K’NEX. See your youngsters build a blimp, ambulance, or even the Eiffel Tower!

STEAMagination – It’s the connection of STEAM (science, technology, engineering, arts & math) with a child’s natural curiosity and creativity and it powers the fun of each and every K’NEX building set. Building with K’NEX puts children on a path towards a fundamental understanding of STEAM/STEM subjects.

DEVELOPMENTAL BENEFITS – K’NEX supports key areas of a child’s developmental growth. As they click the different parts together and discover how the building system works, they’re strengthening hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills, problem-solving skills, spatial awareness, and exercising their imagination!

COMMITMENT TO QUALITY – K’NEX rods and connectors are responsibly made in America at a landfill-free, zero-waste green manufacturing facility in Hatfield, Pennsylvania. We test to the strictest quality and safety standards, ensuring that your child has a successful, trouble-free building experience.

PARTS GUARANTEE – Broken part? Missing part? If you find yourself in need of a replacement for any reason, just give us a call! We’ll get you what you need so that your child can get back to building as soon as possible.
